short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Libra Cryptocurrency Payment app developed with the aim of creating a simple UX that allows users to make simple transactions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Libra Cryptocurrency Micropayment Chrome Extension developed with the aim of creating a simple UX that allows readers to bypass paywalls without a paid subscription or access free articles without ads via Libra micropayments.
